topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Modifying Images

body.p: You can modify images, as needed, to change the name and description of the image, or protect and un-protect the image.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Project dashboard, then the System panel, then the Images link.
In the Images screen, click Edit next to the image you want to modify.

ul.li: Name - Enter a name for the image.
Description - Optionally, enter a brief description of the image.
Protected - Select this option to prevent the image from being deleted. Leave the option clear to allow the image to be deleted.

li.p: Note: Fields that cannot be modified are shaded.

section.title: Managing Metadata
section.p: Compute uses a metadata service for virtual machine instances to retrieve instance-specific data.
You can add and remove metadata for flavors, see Managing Metadata.
